## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G28910](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G28910)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ATMYB30, MYB30</u>
- **Gene Name:** myb domain protein 30
- **Description:**   myb domain protein 30;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [myb30-1]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Deficient in systemic acclimation to light stress.
   - [myb30-2]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Deficient in systemic acclimation to light stress.
   - [myb30-2]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Elongated roots.
